# IConfigurationReader interface

Defines a contract for a configuration reader that reads logger settings.

```csharp
public interface IConfigurationReader
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [ReadConfiguration](IConfigurationReader/ReadConfiguration.md)(…) | Reads the logger configuration from the specified path and returns the configuration settings. |
